title: Ukrainians set to quit embattled Sievierodonetsk as Russians inch forward
content:
1. Ukrainians set to quit embattled Sievierodonetsk as Russians inch forward  Reuters.com
  2. Ukrainian troops to withdraw from Severodonetsk, local leader says  Axios
  3. Ukrainian forces will have to leave key eastern city, Luhansk governor says; retired Russian major captured  CNBC
  4. The war in Ukraine has entered a new, and more difficult, phase  The Guardian
  5. Latest Russia-Ukraine war news: live updates  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ウクライナ人がシエヴィエロドネツクから撤退し、ロシア人が前進している。
乌克兰人将退出陷入困境的西维罗多涅茨克，因为俄罗斯人正步步为营
烏克蘭人將退出陷入困境的西維羅多涅茨克，因爲俄羅斯人正步步爲營
